languages.text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} increases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by 2 points less. If this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} reduces the effect on veil degradation to less than 0, veil degradation is instead decreased by 1.
languages.original_text: При первом применении {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} показатель {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончения завесы{/g} увеличивается на 2 меньше, чем обычно. Если при этом воздействие на истончение завесы приобретает отрицательное значение, то показатель истончения завесы уменьшается на 1.

traits.locale_text: The first psychic power used each turn damages the veil by 2 points less. If this talent reduces damage to the veil to less than 0, the veil is instead restored by 1.
The first psychic power used each turn increase veil degradation by 2 points less. If this talent reduces the effect on veil degradation to less than 0, veil degradation is instead decreased by 1.

The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} increases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by 2 points less. If this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} reduces the effect on veil degradation to less than 0, veil degradation is instead decreased by 1.

languages.text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}使用的首个{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}效果降低2点。如果此{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}将{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁{/g}恶化的效果降为负值，则障壁恶化的情况降低1点。
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} increases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by 2 points less. If this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} reduces the effect on {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} degradation to less than 0, veil degradation is instead decreased by 1.

traits.locale_text: 每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}使用的首个灵能能力，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}障壁恶化{/g}效果降低2点。如果此{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}将障壁恶化的{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}降为负值，则障壁恶化的情况降低1点。

languages.text: El primer {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poder psíquico{/g} que use cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} en 2 puntos menos. Si este {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} reduce el efecto de la degradación del {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}velo{/g} por debajo de 0, la degradación del velo se reduce en 1.
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} increases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by 2 points less. If this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} reduces the effect on {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} degradation to less than 0, veil degradation is instead decreased by 1.

traits.locale_text: El primer poder psíquico que use cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}degradación del velo{/g} en 2 puntos menos. Si este {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} de la degradación del velo por debajo de 0, la degradación del velo se reduce en 1.

languages.text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初に使用する{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}値が2ポイント少なくなる。この{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェール{/g}の劣化効果が0以下になる場合、ヴェールの劣化は1減少する。
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} increases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by 2 points less. If this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} reduces the effect on {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} degradation to less than 0, veil degradation is instead decreased by 1.

traits.locale_text: 各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初に使用する超能力による{g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}ヴェールの劣化{/g}の増加値が2ポイント少なくなる。この{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}でヴェールの劣化{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}が0以下になる場合、ヴェールの劣化は1減少する。

languages.text: При первом применении {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} показатель {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончения завесы{/g} увеличивается на 2 меньше, чем обычно. Если при этом воздействие на истончение завесы приобретает отрицательное значение, то показатель истончения завесы уменьшается на 1.
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} increases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by 2 points less. If this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} reduces the effect on veil degradation to less than 0, veil degradation is instead decreased by 1.

traits.locale_text: Первое применение психосилы за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} снижает интенсивность {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончения завесы{/g} на 2. Если при этом истончение завесы приобретает отрицательное значение, то завеса восстанавливается на 1.

Первое применение психосилы за {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g} снижает интенсивность {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}истончения завесы{/g} на 2. Если при этом истончение завесы приобретает отрицательное значение, то завеса восстанавливается на 1.

languages.text: Für jeden {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Zug{/g} gilt: Die erste genutzte psionische Kraft erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Schleierverschlechterung{/g} um 2 Punkte weniger. Sollte dieses {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Talent{/g} den {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Effekt{/g} auf die Schleierverschlechterung auf 0 reduzieren, wird diese stattdessen um 1 reduziert.
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} increases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by 2 points less. If this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} reduces the effect on {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} degradation to less than 0, veil degradation is instead decreased by 1.

traits.locale_text: Für jede {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} gilt: Die erste genutzte psionische Kraft erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Schleierverschlechterung{/g} um 2 Punkte weniger. Sollte dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} auf die Schleierverschlechterung auf 0 reduzieren, wird diese stattdessen um 1 reduziert.

languages.text: Le premier {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} utilisé lors de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du Voile{/g} de 2 points. Si ce {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} fait baisser l'effet sur la Dégradation du {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Voile{/g} jusqu'à une valeur inférieure à 0, la Dégradation du Voile diminue de 1.
languages.original_text: The first {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic power{/g} used each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} increases {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil degradation{/g} by 2 points less. If this {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} reduces the effect on {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}veil{/g} degradation to less than 0, veil degradation is instead decreased by 1.

traits.locale_text: Le premier pouvoir psychique utilisé lors de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} réduit la {g|Encyclopedia:VeilThickness}Dégradation du Voile{/g} de 2 points. Si ce {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} fait baisser l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} sur la Dégradation du Voile jusqu'à une valeur inférieure à 0, la Dégradation du Voile diminue de 1.
